sentences.en: "Professor Theron," he began, "I'm very pleased to see you"
sentences.cn: “西伦教授，”他开口说道，“很高兴见到您。”

sentences.en: Even in his dotage, the Professor still sits on the committee.
sentences.cn: 即便上了年纪，教授仍然是委员会的一员。

sentences.en: He looked like a nutty professor.
sentences.cn: 他看上去像个疯疯癫癫的教授。

sentences.en: He was a professor of criminal law at Harvard University law school.
sentences.cn: 他是哈佛大学法学院的刑法学教授。
他的爷爷曾是一名教授。

sentences.en: I had met Professor Lown before.
Professor Camm was a great friend of hers.
sentences.cn: 卡姆教授是她的一位挚友。

sentences.en: Professor Fish has been nothing if not professional.
sentences.cn: 菲什教授一贯表现出很高的职业水准。

sentences.en: Professor Griffiths explained how the drug appears to work.
sentences.cn: 格里菲思教授解释了那种药物的工作原理。

sentences.en: Professor Hisamatsu spoke neither English nor German.
sentences.cn: 久松教授既不会讲英语，也不会讲德语。

sentences.en: Professor Oswald takes a slightly more lenient view.
sentences.cn: 奥斯瓦尔德教授的观点稍微温和些。

sentences.en: Robert Dunn is a professor of economics at George Washington University.
sentences.cn: 罗伯特·达恩是乔治·华盛顿大学经济学的教师。

sentences.en: The professor has been a frequent target for animal rights extremists.
sentences.cn: 那位教授屡屡受到极端动物保护主义者的抨击。

sentences.en: The professor improvised a poem in the class.
sentences.cn: 教授在课堂上即兴创作了一首诗。

sentences.en: The professor lambasted me for my careless mistake.
sentences.cn: 教授严厉批评了我的粗心错误。

sentences.en: The Professor was beginning to get on Molly's wick.
sentences.cn: 教授快要把莫莉惹毛了。

sentences.en: These questions were tailor-made for Professor Posner.
sentences.cn: 这些问题请教波斯纳教授算是问对人了。

sentences.en: We were laughing about that absent-minded professor.
sentences.cn: 我们都在笑那个心不在焉的教授。

words.tran_cn: 声称的；公开承认的；伪称的
教授的；学者派头的；教授似的
在表面上；公然地；专业地
职业，专业；声明，宣布，表白
声称；断言；伪称（profess的过去分词）
自称；公开表示；宣称信奉；正式准予加入

phrases.tran_cn: 做事心不在焉者；无头苍蝇；健忘的人
n. 助理教授（级别高于讲师而低于副教授）
名誉教授；荣誉教授；荣誉退休教授
（尤指牛津、剑桥大学的）钦定讲座教授
研究教授；研究讲座教授

trans.tran_en: a teacher of the highest rank in a university department
